>
[Injection Reservoir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1977)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Adjustment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=380" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 63 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to a non- injection  melee weapon that deals piercing damage

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This reservoir and spring-loaded needle can be attached to a weapon to let it inject deadly poisons. Additionally, the reservoir can be filled with an [injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97) poison. Immediately after a successful attack with the adjusted weapon, you can inject the target with the loaded poison by activating the reservoir with an Interact action. Refilling the reservoir with a new poison requires 3 Interact actions and uses both hands.

 Adding an injection reservoir to a weapon throws off its balance, causing the multiple attack penalty with the weapon to be one greater than usual (usually –6 on a second attack and –11 on a third; or –5 and –10 with an [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) weapon).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
